ProjectTitle:
Expression of the metabolite transporter SLC4A4 in pancreatic cancer cells promotes immune
escape and resistance to immunotherapy
InitialFeedbackHistory:
08/06/2022
2.2 Data description: It may be easier to summarize your datasets in a table
4.2 Metadata: The MIBBI metadata standards may be useful for your project: https://fairsharing.org/3518, especially MINISEQE for sequencing and MIFlowCyt for flow cytometry. For microscopy you may use OME (https://fairsharing.org/3502) and for animal experiments ARRIVE (https://fairsharing.org/FAIRsharing.t58zhj)
7. Sharing: Have you considered any specific repositories? you can consider using KU Leuven RDR (www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr) or domain specific repositories including those from EBI (www.ebi.ac.uk/submission/) or recommended by F1000 research (https://f1000research.com/for-authors/data-guidelines)
label: good with suggestions
